intro:
Includes Three Games to Boost Thinking and Learning!
A fun and educational mini-game collection for both kids and adults!
description:
This educational game collection brings together three fun mini-games, perfect for helping children learn while they play.

It’s ideal for developing cognitive skills, logical thinking, and emotional awareness — and adults will find it great for keeping their minds sharp, too!


Included Games：

« Visual Perspective »
Choose the correct visual from four options based on how stacked blocks would appear from a specific angle.
Playing repeatedly helps improve spatial awareness and visual reasoning.

« Odd One Out »
Look at four illustrations and spot the one that doesn’t share a common trait with the others.
This game encourages critical thinking and analytical skills.

« Match the Season »
Guess which season — winter, spring, summer, or autumn — the object in the illustration belongs to.
This helps children become more aware of seasonal changes, nurturing emotional development and creativity.


Perfect for parent-child interaction or even as a brain workout for grown-ups, this title makes learning fun and engaging at any age.
